concept.display: No Report Ordered or Replacement Cost has Not been Verified
concept.definition: Indicates that no formal inspection report was commissioned and the replacement cost value has not been independently verified.

Ningún informe solicitado o costo de reemplazo no verificado

concept.definition: An inspection conducted by the selling agent or broker.
A third-party inspection company that has been authorized or approved to conduct property inspections.
A property valuation performed by a certified professional appraiser.

concept.display: Home Evaluation Calculator or an Equivalent Worksheet
concept.definition: A standardized calculation tool or worksheet used to estimate property replacement cost.

Calculadora de evaluación de vivienda o hoja de trabajo equivalente

concept.definition: A property assessment conducted by the claims department, typically following a loss.
An inspection or report provided by the local fire department.
A specialized inspection of wood-burning appliances and systems conducted by a certified WETT inspector.

designation.value: Inspeccionado WETT (Transferencia de Tecnología de Energía de Madera)

concept.definition: An inspection conducted remotely using photographs submitted by the policyholder or representative.
An inspection conducted by municipal authorities or building department.
